mapper.sql: id, user_id, name, description, url, md5, create_date, modify_date, deleted
mapper.delete: delete from jh_upload where deleted = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into jh_upload (id, user_id, name, description, url, md5, create_date, modify_date, deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md5,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into jh_upload
id,
user_id,
name,
description,
url,
md5,
create_date,
modify_date,
deleted,

mapper.update:
update jh_upload
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where deleted = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jh_upload set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where deleted = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
